title: #077  - How to Strategically Prepare for a Launch
itunes:title: #077  - How to Strategically Prepare for a Launch
description:
This week I’m sharing the nitty gritty details of the launch of my digital product, Project Storyline. With 2 and a half weeks to go, I share everything I’ve done to strategically prepare - from content creation, launch goal numbers, fresh marketing ideas, and lead generation. It's a pure insider's look at what I've been up to. Enjoy!

PS. My free challenge ‘Double Down on Your DMs’ starts soon. Register today and join thousands of boss babes who will be signing up!
